backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, posts, chunked uploads, and internal state for media handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files affected by specific UI update requirements and their associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short descriptions of key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon with appropriate metadata tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, routing between views, profile setup, uploads, and footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/feed/Feed.tsx: Paginated post feed that loads posts, shows loading/error states, and handles page navigation.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post's media with basic video detection and click handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with circular logo, authentication controls, and upload button for logged-in users.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Unauthenticated landing page with circular hero video, title/subtitle, and three marketing cards including GeekGoat image.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user to enter their name with save handling and disabled state logic.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadBut: Simple upload button triggering an external click handler.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadCom: File upload UI supporting selection, chunked upload, progress display, and cancellation.
frontend/src/components/viewer/PostViewe: Viewer for a single post with media display, share link, and optional delete for the author.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedUpload.ts: Handles chunked media uploads with retry logic, cancellation, progress tracking, and finalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and posts using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode, applying global colors and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/chunking.ts: Implements helpers to slice files into fixed-size chunks and compute chunk ranges for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and architectural notes for an ICP media-sharing app with chunked uploads.
